sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis d'accord avec ton opinion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I agree with your opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī míng zhíyè yùndòngyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un athlète professionnel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a professional athlete.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le succès réside dans l'effort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Success lies in hard work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je serai payé à la fin du mois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I will get paid at the end of the month.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎobǎn hěn zànshǎng tā de gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le patron apprécie beaucoup son travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The boss appreciates his work very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 战争给人们带来了痛苦。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhànzhēng gěi rénmen dàilái le tòngkǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La guerre a apporté de la souffrance aux gens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: War has brought suffering to people.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū kěyǐ zuòwéi cānkǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre peut servir de référence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book can be used as a reference.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son mari est médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her husband is a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a eu une averse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There was a spell of rain.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut saluer quand on se rencontre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should greet people when you meet.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, prends ton temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't worry, take your time.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他们为这件事争论了很久。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen wèi zhè jiàn shì zhēnglùn le hěn jiǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont débattu de cette affaire pendant longtemps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They argued about this matter for a long time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette mesure cible les jeunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This measure targets young people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise va tenir une réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company will hold a meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhēngfú le zhè zuò gāoshān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a conquis cette haute montagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He conquered this high mountain.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zhēngqiú nǐ de yìjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais solliciter ton avis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to ask for your opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa détermination n'a jamais vacillé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His determination has never wavered.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut vérifier les bagages avant de partir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Check the luggage before leaving.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après le repas, nous allons nous promener.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After eating, we will go for a walk.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il dirige la circulation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is directing traffic.
